doc:
Rudy Bowman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rudy_Bowman 0 Rudy Bowman (15 December 1890 – 29 October 1972) was an American actor. He played mostly small and uncredited roles in various westerns. His film appearances include She Wore a Yellow Ribbon (1949). He also guest starred as Robert E. Lee in The Twilight Zone episode "The Bard". Rudy_Bowman ( 15_December_1890 – 29_October_1972 ) was an_American_actor . He played mostly small_and_uncredited_roles in various_westerns . His_film_appearances include She Wore a_Yellow_Ribbon_(_1949_) . He also guest starred as Robert_E._Lee in The_Twilight_Zone_episode " The_Bard_" .
